text: tae anak( mou ham meat) bankheunh der ryyte anak del yk chamnng robsa khluon thveuchea mcheasa robsa ke haey a l laoh ban thveu aoy ke v nge v ng towteam karchehdoeng robsa ke( delke doengpi karpit te chreusa reusa yk brakear v nge v ng) haey trong ban bet trachiek ning chetd robsa ke promteang thveu aoy phnek robsa ke mean rneang betbang yeang chit noh? dau che neah tae mean anaknea del ach changaoulobangheanh dl ke banteabpi a l laoh ( thveu aoy ke v nge v ng) noh? tae puok anak min kitpichearna te ryy
